listings.title: Prime Residential Plot in Financial District
listings.description: A fully approved residential plot located in the heart of Hyderabad's Financial District. Ideal for a luxury home or investment. All approvals in place including HMDA layout approval.

rera_details.reason: Plot in an approved layout (< 1000 sq mtrs), RERA registration not mandatory but layout is HMDA approved.

verification_report_card.report_summary: All government records match. No liens or disputes. HMDA approved layout. Ready for registration.

listings.title: Corner Plot in HMDA Approved Layout - Kokapet
listings.description: Excellent investment opportunity. A spacious corner plot in the fastest-growing suburb of Hyderabad. Direct access to the Outer Ring Road (ORR). Full approvals from HMDA and DTCP.

rera_details.reason: Plot in an approved layout. Developer has obtained HMDA approval.

verification_report_card.report_summary: Prime location corner plot with all approvals. Clear title and no dues.

listings.title: Affordable Residential Plot near Warangal University
listings.description: Great investment for education corridor. Located close to Kakatiya University and new medical college. DTCP approved layout with all basic infrastructure.

water.details: Borewell water available in layout, pending individual connection

listings.title: Beach View Plot in Bheemili Vizag
listings.description: Rare opportunity to own a plot with sea view. Approved by VUDA. Clear title and all documents verified via Meebhoomi.

listings.title: Temple View Plot near Tirupati
listings.description: A quiet, approved plot in the spiritual capital of AP. Close to the new bypass road. TTD layout with all approvals.

listings.title: Premium Gated Community Plot - Tellapur
listings.description: Part of a premium gated community with all amenities: parks, clubhouse, and underground wiring. HMDA approved and RERA registered community.

listings.title: NADA Approved Plot - Rushikonda Hills
listings.description: Exclusive plot in the upscale Rushikonda area. Approved by VUDA and located near the IT corridor. Stunning hill and sea views.

listings.title: Large Agricultural Land with Dharani Clear Title - Shankarpally
listings.description: Vast agricultural land suitable for farmhouse or investment. Dharani records clear, no litigation. Well and electricity connection available. Layout approval pending verification.

layout_approval.remarks: Seller claims layout approval applied, documents not provided yet

verification_report_card.report_summary: Land ownership verified with Dharani. Layout approval documents pending. Not approved for non-agricultural use yet.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: Property is agricultural land. Buyer must verify conversion feasibility before purchase.

fair_price_estimate.note: Price dependent on layout approval status

listings.title: DTCP Approved Plot in Guntur New Capital Region
listings.description: Investment hotspot. Located in the influence zone of the new Andhra Pradesh capital region. DTCP approved layout with good road connectivity.

listings.title: Commercial Corner Plot on ORR - Exit 7
listings.description: High-visibility commercial plot directly on the Outer Ring Road. HMDA approved for commercial use. Ideal for hotel, showroom, or office.

verification_report_card.report_summary: Prime commercial plot with high visibility. All approvals in place for commercial construction.

listings.title: HMDA Approved Plot in Narsingi
listings.description: Well-developed residential plot in a bustling locality. Close to schools, hospitals, and shopping malls. Utility bill verification pending.

electricity.remarks: Seller provided bill copies, verification with TSSPDCL pending

verification_report_card.report_summary: HMDA approval and title documents verified. Utility bills verification in progress. Some discrepancies in electricity bill address.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: Address on electricity bill doesn't match property address. Owner has applied for correction.

listings.title: Approved Plot Near Srikalahasti Temple
listings.description: Quiet residential plot near the famous temple town. DTCP approved. Title verification completed, layout approval document verification pending.

layout_approval.remarks: Document provided but digital verification with DTCP office pending due to technical issues

verification_report_card.report_summary: Title and ownership verified. DTCP approval document verification pending with government portal.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: DTCP approval number verified, but document authentication pending with DTCP Chittoor office.

listings.title: DTCP Approved Plot in Khammam City
listings.description: Good investment opportunity in Khammam city. Close to railway station and bus stand. Documents under verification - Seller yet to provide complete documentation.

layout_approval.remarks: Seller claims approved layout, documents not yet provided

land_ownership.remarks: Seller has not provided Dharani documents for verification

verification_report_card.report_summary: Verification not started. Seller has not provided required documents. Buyer advised to request complete documentation before proceeding.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: Property listed without proper documentation. Multiple follow-ups with seller pending.

fair_price_estimate.note: Cannot provide accurate estimate without document verification

listings.title: Certified Agricultural Land with Borewell - Kurnool
listings.description: Productive agricultural land with clear Meebhoomi records. Ideal for farming or future conversion.

listings.title: Residential Plot in Nizamabad Town
listings.description: Centrally located plot in Nizamabad. Close to Nizamabad Medical College. Documents under review - Verification in progress.

layout_approval.remarks: Seller claims approval but hasn't provided documents

land_ownership.remarks: Documents provided but show discrepancies in survey number

verification_report_card.report_summary: Document verification in progress. Discrepancy found in survey number. Seller requested to provide corrected documents.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: Survey number in sale deed (67/89A) doesn't match with Dharani records (67/89B). Seller has been asked to clarify.

fair_price_estimate.note: Verification incomplete, price estimate not reliable

listings.title: HMDA Approved Plot in Bandlaguda
listings.description: Affordable plot in a developing area. Good connectivity to the city via ORR. All approvals secured.

listings.title: VUDA Approved Plot in Anakapalle
listings.description: Spacious plot in the industrial hub near Vizag. Growing area due to new investments. VUDA approval verification in progress.

layout_approval.remarks: Document provided but VUDA layout approval verification with original records pending

verification_report_card.report_summary: Title and ownership verified. VUDA approval document verification in progress with the authority.

listings.title: DTCP Approved Plot in Karimnagar
listings.description: Prime plot in Karimnagar city. Close to Manair River project. Listing under review - Documents not yet provided for verification.

verification_report_card.report_summary: Verification not initiated. Seller has not responded to document requests. Listing may be removed if documents not provided.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: Multiple attempts to contact seller failed. Verification team has sent reminders.

listings.title: Approved Plot in Nellore City
listings.description: Centrally located plot in Nellore. Close to RTC Bus Stand and railway station. All approvals from local bodies.

listings.title: HMDA Approved Plot in Mokila
listings.description: Luxury plot in the upcoming Mokila area. Close to Shankarpally and upcoming theme parks. HMDA approved layout.

listings.title: DTCP Approved Plot in Ongole
listings.description: Well-located plot in Ongole town. Close to Ongole Railway Station. Ideal for investment or construction.

listings.title: HMDA Approved Plot in Kollur
listings.description: Rapidly developing area with excellent social infrastructure. HMDA approved plot. Electricity bill verification pending.

electricity.remarks: Bill provided but verification with TSSPDCL portal shows address mismatch

verification_report_card.report_summary: HMDA approval and title verified. Electricity bill verification failed - address mismatch. Seller requested to provide corrected bill.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: Electricity bill shows different survey number. Seller claims it's a clerical error and has applied for correction.

listings.title: Approved Plot in Kakinada
listings.description: Prime location plot near the beach road. Good for residential or commercial use. Kakinada Municipal Corporation approved.

listings.title: Industrial Plot in Hardware Park
listings.description: Rare industrial plot available in Hardware Park. All necessary approvals from TSIIC. Some documents under verification.

water.remarks: Water connection bills not provided for last 6 months

environmental_clearance.remarks: Seller claims clearance obtained but documents not provided

verification_report_card.report_summary: TSIIC approval and title verified. Water bills and environmental clearance documents pending.

listings.title: Approved Plot in Anantapur City
listings.description: Central location plot in Anantapur. Close to Anantapur Medical College. DTCP approved.

listings.title: HMDA Approved Layout Plot - Adibatla
listings.description: Affordable plot near the Pharma City and ITIR. Good potential for future growth. HMDA approved layout. Encumbrance verification pending.

encumbrance_certificate.remarks: Seller has applied for EC, expected in 3 days

verification_report_card.report_summary: HMDA approval and title verified. Encumbrance Certificate pending from seller.
verification_report_card.verification_notes: EC application submitted. Will be updated once received.
